abstract: As the prevalence of multimorbidity grows, provision of effective healthcare is more challenging. Both multimorbidity and complexity in healthcare delivery may be associated with worse outcomes. We studied consecutive, unique emergency non …

abstract: Integrating Artificial Intelligence (AI) into Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSS) presents significant opportunities for improving healthcare delivery, particularly in fields like ophthalmology. This paper explores the usability and trustworthiness of an …
